content.question: What does the writer hope Mr. Yamaguchi will do?

choices.label: Register her for a Japanese language class
Send her information about volunteer opportunities
Help her with a translation project
Introduce her to community center staff

content.answer: Send her information about volunteer opportunities

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
